channel.title: Comments on: Jesus i have 7000+ trophies and I’m still not gold how many trophies u need?

item.title: By: greentiger79
item.dc:creator: greentiger79
item.description: You need to reach level 600 in order to get to gold.
item.content:encoded: You need to reach level 600 in order to get to gold.

item.title: By: YoRHa2B_
item.dc:creator: YoRHa2B_
item.description: Level 600 is when the gold trophy level appears so you have quite a way to go my friend.
item.content:encoded: Level 600 is when the gold trophy level appears so you have quite a way to go my friend.

item.title: By: EvaristeGalois11
item.dc:creator: EvaristeGalois11
item.description: It's not a matter of number of trophies, it's the overall score. Trophies don't value the same: iirc bronzes are 15, silvers 30, golds 90 and platinums 300.
item.content:encoded: It’s not a matter of number of trophies, it’s the overall score. Trophies don’t value the same: iirc bronzes are 15, silvers 30, golds 90 and platinums 300.

item.title: By: MythSith
item.dc:creator: MythSith
item.description: Holy fuck man i guess Sony really Changed this System with the New gen in mind. Maybe in another 8 years bro xD
item.content:encoded: Holy fuck man i guess Sony really Changed this System with the New gen in mind. Maybe in another 8 years bro xD

item.title: By: LT_Snaker
item.dc:creator: LT_Snaker
item.description: There a re 3 levels of Silver too.
item.content:encoded: There a re 3 levels of Silver too.

item.title: By: _michael_is_not_cool
item.dc:creator: _michael_is_not_cool
item.description: I have a long journey ahead

item.title: By: sluggerVII
item.dc:creator: sluggerVII
item.description: It’s going to take you a while. For example, I have 227 Plats, 1189 golds, 3447 silvers and 11,209 bronzes. I’m still only at level 588 and haven’t hit gold yet
item.content:encoded: It’s going to take you a while. For example, I have 227 Plats, 1189 golds, 3447 silvers and 11,209 bronzes. I’m still only at level 588 and haven’t hit gold yet

item.title: By: mortal_rombat17
item.dc:creator: mortal_rombat17
item.description: I have nowhere near that many, but I wish I knew all my PS3 account info and didn't have to use a different name on PS4 because my score is split now. You needed to know the DOB, but when I got a PS3 I was like 12 and just put in 1920 or something.
item.content:encoded: I have nowhere near that many, but I wish I knew all my PS3 account info and didn’t have to use a different name on PS4 because my score is split now. You needed to know the DOB, but when I got a PS3 I was like 12 and just put in 1920 or something.

item.title: By: MonirKinder
item.dc:creator: MonirKinder
item.description: Wtf is wrong with all the people hating on you for getting trophies?
item.content:encoded: Wtf is wrong with all the people hating on you for getting trophies?
